display_help: A good Mastermind always plans ahead, but a great one knows when to make a strategic sacrifice. You have equipped all your Henchmen with explosives. When the time is right, select a Henchman and set off the Detonator. Undead and Robots are easily rigged and will blow up instantly, devastating nearby enemies. Ninjas, Soldiers and other free thinking Henchmen will try to place the explosive on the ground and get away. But you know... the fuse is short. Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: Sacrifice Henchman, PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Lethal/Fire), Foe Knockback
display_target_help: The Antidote has granted you temporary resistance to Disorient, Hold, Sleep, and Immobilize effects and your resistance to Toxic Damage is improved.
display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Slow, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, and Immobilize effects and Toxic Damage with your {PowerName} power.
display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Slow, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, and Immobilize effects and improves your resistance to Toxic Damage.
